events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department for further evaluation based on your software development skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to assist you throughout the hiring process for the developer role you applied for.
We completed the initial screening of your resume and are impressed with your experience in software engineering and relevant technologies.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions. Your detailed answers demonstrate strong technical knowledge.
We have scheduled your technical interview for April 20th at 2 PM to assess your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
